mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.name, case when sm.id is null then 'F' else 'T' end checked from sys_permission t left join sys_module_permission smp on smp.permission_id = t.id and smp.module_id=#{moduleId} left join sys_module sm on sm.id = smp.module_id ORDER BY t.sequence ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SYS_MODULE_PERMISSION WHERE module_id=#{moduleId} OR permission_id=#{moduleId}
